AzureAD.TenantId: [Enter Tenant Id (Obtained from the Azure portal. Select 'Endpoints' from the 'App registrations' blade and use the GUID in any of the URLs), e.g. da41245a5-11b3-996c-00a8-4d99re19f292]
AzureAD.ClientId: [Enter the Client Id of the service (Application ID obtained from the Azure portal), e.g. ba74781c2-53c2-442a-97c2-3d60re42f403]
AzureAD.AndroidRedirectUri: [Replace this with the redirect URI for your Android application]
AzureAD.iOSRedirectUri: [Replace this with the redirect URI for your iOS application]
